entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and early afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 09 January 2023
